name: Elijah
description: Prophet of fire who challenged Baal and called fire from heaven. Taken up in chariot of fire. The prophet who changed everything.

calling-fire.name: Calling Fire from Heaven
calling-fire.description: Arms raised as fire falls on Mount Carmel
calling-fire.prompt: arms raised toward sky as fire descends from heaven - fire consuming altar, water, and sacrifice, face showing mix of intensity and vindication, the moment that proved everything

challenging-prophets.name: Challenging the Prophets
challenging-prophets.description: Standing alone against 450 prophets of Baal
challenging-prophets.prompt: standing alone facing crowd of false prophets - confident defiant pose, outnumbered but unafraid, 'how long will you limp between two opinions', the lone voice of truth

by-the-brook.name: Fed by Ravens
by-the-brook.description: By brook Cherith, ravens bringing food
by-the-brook.prompt: seated by stream as ravens bring bread and meat - wilderness prophet being supernaturally fed, trusting in divine provision during drought

still-small-voice.name: Hearing the Whisper
still-small-voice.description: In cave, hearing God's gentle whisper
still-small-voice.prompt: standing at cave entrance, head bowed to listen - hand perhaps to ear, wind and fire passed, now hearing the still small voice, encountering God in whisper not storm

chariot-of-fire.name: Ascending in Chariot
chariot-of-fire.description: Taken up to heaven in chariot of fire
chariot-of-fire.prompt: being carried up in chariot of fire - horses of fire, whirlwind, mantle falling to earth, ascending to heaven without dying, the legendary departure

mantle-throw.name: Throwing the Mantle
mantle-throw.description: Throwing mantle on Elisha, calling successor
mantle-throw.prompt: throwing prophetic mantle onto young Elisha - the garment of power and calling, choosing the one who would carry double portion, succession moment
